name: @realm/integration-tests
description: A wrapper module that can install and run Realm JS tests in various environments

scripts.lint: npm run tests/lint && npm run node/lint && npm run electron/lint && npm run react-native/lint
scripts.test: npm run node/test && npm run electron/test && npm run react-native/test
scripts.postinstall: npm run tests/install; npm run node/install; npm run electron/install; npm run react-native/install
